ZCB.ZCBackstoryDef.title: colony child
ZCB.ZCBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in our colony... and is still growing

ZCB.ZCBackstoryDef.title: test
ZCB.ZCBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the sludge-smeared sewers of a polluted industrial world. \n[PAWN_pronoun] befriended the strange insects in the darkness, and learned to love them. \n[PAWN_possessive] skills are amazing!
